Offbeat Alligator Spotted Sheltering Under Car In Florida Driveway By Shreyashi Chakraborty 05/26/20 AT 8:10 AM Florida police received a rather unusual yet interesting call for help Saturday (May 23) as someone reported seeing an alligator underneath a car in a Naples driveway. The alligator was out wandering in the rainy afternoon, and was spotted lounging under a parked vehicle in the Seagate area, police said in a statement. An officer got in action and rescued it from under the homeowner's car with the help of alligator trappers. "Upon arrival, our officer located a University of Florida fan socially distancing himself under the homeowner's vehicle," the statement read.
